attributes.action: pay all elected representertive in the UK no more than statutory minimum wage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our ellected representertive tell us that the minimum wage is all that is required for a person in the United Kingdom to live on, as such this should apply to them and all other waged elected representertives. A system of open and transpairent expensies and competertive wages for support staff should be implemented at the same time.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
